KMS method to activate your Vista !! (Business edition only)

About KMS - 
Microsoft now employs a new technology to activate Volume License Business Vista, called KMS.
KMS activiated Business Vista is required to get re-activation every 180 days against a KMS server.
The Chinese community already setup few KMS servers over the Internet to activate Business Windows Vista.
This is not a crack, this is a REAL activation. 
Don't download potentially harmful cracks, they can damage your systems.
Do Activate your Windows Vista Business Edition against a KMS server is the proper way!!
Few KMS servers operated by Chinese IT professional now online to provide activation services free of charge. One of them, sito.kmip.net, now operate 24 hours a day 7 days a week.

**********************************************************************
Step 01:

Install Vista FINAL RELEASE with Key YFKBB-PQJJV-G996G-VWGXY-2V3X8
Choose "Business edition" ONLY not others !!

Step 02:

When Windows setup completed and Internet access setup completed.
Open the Command Prompt under "Administrator Mode", 
That is, right click the Command Prompt icon, select "run as admin"

Now activate your Business Vista against the KMS server, sito.kmip.net 
(This is a KMS server for Volume License 2.0a activiation, the server is backup by the Chinese local authorities and won't get shut down). 

At command prompt (Admin mode)
key in (followed by Enter at end of each line) - 

cscript c:\windows\system32\slmgr.vbs -skms sito.kmip.net
cscript C:\windows\system32\slmgr.vbs -ato

Your Windows Vista Business Edition has activated !!
If there's error, 
- check if you run command prompt under "Admin mode"
- check if your Vista is final release Business Edition
- try another time, the KMS server might off for maintainence

After activated your Vista Business Edition, you may want to check the activation status

type and followed by Eneter -

cscript c:\windows\system32\slmgr.vbs -dlv

*********************************************************************
KMS Volume License activated Vista is required to do re-activation every 180 days.
The subsequenced re-activation should be performed automatically. If not, repeat step 2 after 6 months.

In case, KMS sito.kmip.net get shutdown, go to Yahoo China at www.yahoo.com.cn do a search on keyword KMS, there should be other KMS server available.

Note: Only works for Business Vista and Enterprise Vista, not other editions!!
Windows Vista totally rules, its super-awesome and I stongly recommend it!

For Your Information ONLY

Latest KMS server (updated Dec 9, 2006)

This new KMS server, kms.vbs.net.cn (or vbs.net.cn), claims to operate 24 hours, 

#01) Install Vista Business Edition with key YFKBB-PQJJV-G996G-VWGXY-2V3X8
#02) Setup your Internet access, then 

- From STAR menu, ACCESSORIES, Run "COMMAND PROMPT" as admin
(Right click the "COMMAND PROMPT" icon, select "Run as Admin" from the sub-menu)

#03 In Command Prompt (Admin mode) dialog, type

cscript c:\windows\system32\slmgr.vbs -skms kms.vbs.net.cn
OR
cscript c:\windows\system32\slmgr.vbs -skms vbs.net.cn

wait for response, then type 
cscript C:\windows\system32\slmgr.vbs -ato

wait for few seconds, Vista Business edition now activated !!!
To check status, 
cscript c:\windows\system32\slmgr.vbs -dlv

If error occurs, check -
is your key YFKBB-PQJJV-G996G-VWGXY-2V3X8 ???
is your Vista Business edition???
is your Command Prompt under Admin mode???
or try another time.

Ok now it is working in Virtual PC 2007.

The trick is to create a fixed size virtual disk in virtual pc.

This solves the status 35a bug.

However Virtual PC cannot run 64 bit software only 32 bit software, so I am installing the x86 version for now to give it a try and to play Geometry Wars :) I'll report back later ;)
